index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to storm damage of public facilities and private property caused by the January 18-19, 1986, storm; ratifying and confirming the declaration of emergency by the Board of Public Works and actions to protect public streets, utilities, facilities, and prevent or abate public hazards to representatives to enter into agreements for Federal and State assistance; making appropriations from the Emergency Fund and other funds; and declaring the emergency therefor.
